title: What are some experiences with blogging? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am a part-time blogger for 8 years. I sold like 3 blogs for now. So I think I have enough experience to share related to blogging. First and foremost, its NOT quality and unique content writing that is enough to propel your blog to web traffic frenzy. That is one of the many signals search engines use to improve your website articles ranking in search engines. The important part is SEO. (Search Engine Optimization). This is like an Art and not a Science. This gets rapidly changed every day and every month and every year. So you have to keep up-to-date info on this aspect. The second point is the niche you choose plays a major role, in your blog getting maximum exposure, traffic and money. If its a competitive niche like Tech, Gadgets etc, you are flowing with the river. But certain in-depth niches like some exceptional disease in health niche which has very less competition and more traffic, if you can do good onsite-SEO, you can get good results. The thing about blogging, is not only the expertise you have on the blog niche, but the amount of competition also matters. So doing keyword research properly and finding the right keywords to target is important. For example, I had a health blog which had only 40 articles, but after 2 years its traffic jumped to 1500 sessions per day. In another tech site, I have 350 articles, but its traffic is less than 700 session per day.

If you can write informative, appealing and entertaining content, then blogging can be a good hobby or even a career for you. For years, I had served as a useful source for those seeking inspiration, help, or advice regarding vocabulary building and speaking and writing skills. I finally decided to own that role and be intentional about it. I started writing about academic success and began providing some tips to crack various English examinations. I founded Writerians with a mission to give others a taste of what goes on in my mind, and I have been at it ever since. How to Choose a Topic and Produce Engaging Content? Being a blogger requires you to think out of the box to make create great and engaging content. That is only possible if you have an interest and extensive knowledge of the topic that you are writing on. So choose a topic that you are passionate about; one that inspires you to write and you will definitely produce good content. How to Get the Ball Rolling? Now after you have done extensive research and are having the content ready, get your domain name registered and choose a blogging platform such as Wordpress, Blogger or Wix. Customise your website and write your first blog! How to Bring Visitors to your Blog? Make sure to be active on your blog. Try to publish a new post at least 1 to 3 times a week. But remember, don’t compromise on your quality for the quantity. Also, don’t forget to work on your SEO and make use of social media platforms to drive traffic to your blog. Hope this helps you. All the best and Happy Writing :)
